events.title: Blind Coding
events.description: Code Without Sight. Debug with Might!
events.details:
üïπÔ∏è Event Stages:
üìù Blind Coding Challenge:
- One participant types with their screen off.
- The other guides them via voice call.
- Accuracy and teamwork are key!
üõ†Ô∏è Debugging Duel:
- Fix the code from Round 1 with 20-second switch turns.
- No explanations, just quick debugging!
- Fewer switches = higher points!

events.title: Robotics Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop on building and programming robots
events.details: Learn the basics of robotics, from assembly to programming. Perfect for beginners and intermediate learners.

events.title: Cultural Night
events.description: A night of music, dance, and theatrical performances
events.details: Showcase your talent in our annual cultural night. Multiple categories including singing, dancing, and drama.
